name: Clench Your Stench
description:
Serve 5 customers to get 5 happy faces. Don't fart near customers or you lose a happy face. You fart when the bar reaches max.

Go to customers with  and wait near them to give them service. You'll know that you're providing service when  appears. The service will be done when the smiley face appears.

Space - Hold in fart
WASD or Arrow Keys - movement
